text: Life is a 2009 British biology show made by the BBC with many episodes. The shows include the aspects of animals' environment, as well as some examples of how the environment shapes different animal species.What is Life? Retrieved October 25, 2009. ==Episodes== Each episode is divided into parts, examples of how different animal species must adapt to the environment.Animals' Interaction with the Environment. Retrieved 10-20-10. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Life website at BBC Online Category:2009 British television series debuts Category:2009 British television series endings Category:2000s British television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British documentaries
title: Life (British TV series)
